content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(0,0,0,0.68)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_color_gradient_direction=”55deg” background_color_gradient_start_position=”25%” background_color_gradient_end_position=”50%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/what-do-managed-service-providers-do.jpg” background_position=”center_left” custom_padding=”155px||155px||true|” custom_padding_tablet=”120px||120px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”50px||50px||true|false” background_last_edited=”on|phone” background_position_tablet=”center”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font=”|800|||||||” header_font_size=”54px” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_duration=”1400ms” animation_intensity_slide=”8%” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”44px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_text_shadow_style=”preset3″ header_text_shadow_style=”preset3″]

success stories

Our systems and processes deliver both results and value
and we always adhere to proven business IT best practices.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/it-support/” button_text=”contact us” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_button=”on” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”1450ms” animation_delay=”350ms” animation_intensity_slide=”9%” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_image=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/it-services.png” background_size=”contain” background_position=”bottom_right” background_last_edited=”on|phone” use_background_color_gradient_tablet=”on” background_color_gradient_start_tablet=”rgba(255,255,255,0.81)” background_color_gradient_end_tablet=”rgba(255,255,255,0.76)” background_color_gradient_overlays_image_tablet=”on” background_position_phone=”top_right”][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″]

What do managed service providers do? 

Managed services reduce costs and save time. As IT support providers we are in the business of mitigating business risks for small to medium businesses, and we only ever have your business’ best interests at heart.

Transparency + People + Technology. 

Delivering value has always been at the heart of our business ethos and we achieve this by:

  • identifying business risks
  • explaining them clearly and succinctly in language everybody can understand
  • implementing people friendly solutions 
  • supporting those solutions so they deliver, every time.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/managed-services/” button_text=”FREE assessment” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_button=”on” button_use_icon=”off” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”1450ms” animation_delay=”350ms” animation_intensity_slide=”9%” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″]

Talk to our team about creating a tailored, cost-effective IT package to mitigate the risks for your business. We have the infrastructure and specialists to make it happen in Auckland and Whangarei without you having the expense of building an in-house IT and services department.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ next_background_color=”#ffffff” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_color=”#58585a” background_enable_image=”off” background_size=”contain” background_position=”top_right” custom_padding=”||22px|||” top_divider_flip=”vertical” bottom_divider_style=”ramp” bottom_divider_height=”100%”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_image src=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/why-choose-a-managed-service-provider.jpg” alt=”why choose a managed service provider” title_text=”why choose a managed service provider” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ border_radii=”on|500px|500px|500px|500px” border_width_all=”17px” border_color_all=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_text_color=”#c8c9ca” header_2_text_color=”#77b856″ custom_margin=”44px||5px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”10px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Become leaner and more efficient

As the first IT managed services provider (MSP) in Whangarei, we have been helping small to medium businesses since 2021. We know what works and what doesn’t. Our seasoned IT consultants are accustomed to providing tech support either remotely or in-person and can diagnose and resolve issues quickly, whether your business is based in Auckland or Whangarei, because we’ve seen them before.

Read on to see how we’ve helped other Auckland and Whangarei businesses like yours become leaner and more efficient.

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/it-support/” button_text=”contact us” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_button=”on” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”1450ms” animation_delay=”350ms” animation_intensity_slide=”9%” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_padding=”8px||8px|||”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_padding=”7px|||||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_font_size=”50px” header_2_font_size=”50px” width=”60%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” header_2_font_size_tablet=”40px” header_2_font_size_phone=”38px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

it and business problems we have solved for others

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ prev_background_color=”#ffffff” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_color=”rgba(228,229,229,0.35)” background_enable_image=”off” background_size=”contain” background_position=”bottom_left” top_divider_style=”ramp” top_divider_height=”100%” top_divider_flip=”vertical” hover_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_padding=”13px|||||”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_margin=”35px||||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_orientation=”center”]

Call 0800-24-7-24-8 to find out more from the MSP team whose IT support is so good you’ll forget it’s even there.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_color=”#58585a” background_image=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/it-services-for-business.png” background_size=”contain” background_position=”bottom_right” custom_padding=”31px||29px|||” global_module=”1667″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_padding=”6px|||||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_image src=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/switch-msp-dark.jpg” alt=”Switch MSP” title_text=”Switch MSP” align=”center” align_tablet=”left” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ max_width=”21%” max_width_tablet=”39%” max_width_phone=”48%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_margin_tablet=”|||-24px|false|false” custom_margin_phone=”|||-15px|false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_padding=”6px||9px|||”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_text_color=”#c8c9ca” header_4_text_color=”#c8c9ca”]

WHANGAREI

Unit B7, 7-11 Nell Place,
Whangarei, 0110
PO Box 722,
Whangarei 0140

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_text_color=”#c8c9ca” header_4_text_color=”#c8c9ca”]

AUCKLAND

PO Box 217116,
Botany Junction,
Auckland 2164

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_text_color=”#c8c9ca” header_4_text_color=”#c8c9ca”]

CONTACT

T: +64 9 470 0600
T: 0800 247 248
E: ask@switchmsp.co.nz

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_text_color=”#c8c9ca” header_4_text_color=”#c8c9ca”]

OPEN HOURS

Mon – Fri | 8am – 5pm
Support | 24 hours 7 days

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
